testcase.name: Validate that user can login successfully - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enters his "standard_user".........................................passed And user enters his right "secret_sauce"....................................passed And user click login button.................................................passed And validate that home page displayed.......................................passed And user select sortion "price high to low".................................passed And user click add to cart..................................................passed And user click cart icon....................................................passed Then validate that item added successfully..................................passed And user click checkout.....................................................passed And user enters his data....................................................passed And user click continue.....................................................passed Then validate total price...................................................passed
